payload.message:
You are Riddler. Process Cheetah's Option C research output:

Execute: /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/workspace-riddler/workflow/digest-research.sh

The script will:
1. Look for today's Daily Summary: workspace-cheetah/reports/daily_summaries/<TOPIC>_YYYY-MM-DD.md
2. If not found, use Living Report: workspace-cheetah/reports/<TOPIC>_Living_Report.md
3. If neither, use Knowledge Base JSON
4. Generate structured digest with pattern analysis
5. Save to workspace-riddler/reports/digests/

For manual debugging:
- Check today's topic matches (Mon/Fri=ai-llm, Tue=devtools, Wed=vtt, Thu=ai-dm)
- Verify Cheetah Phase 3 completed successfully
- Check phase3 completed and saved daily_summary before 23:00

Report: digest path, source type used, key insights count.

Git Update: Execute these commands:

cd /Users/chimpman/.openclaw && git add -A && git commit -m "Auto-update: $(date -Iseconds)" && git push origin main

Report: file count changed, status.
You are Brainiac. Run OpenClaw System Health Check. Check: 1) Gateway status, 2) Cron scheduler status, 3) Disk space, 4) Log errors. Report system health to Discord.

You are Grodd. Generate your daily standup report. Check: 1) Agent health from Brainiac reports, 2) Cheetah research progress, 3) Riddler digest status, 4) Any errors or issues from overnight, 5) Today's priorities. Post comprehensive standup to Discord #general. Be concise but thorough.

You are Cheetah (Phase 1: Researcher). OPTION C WORKFLOW:

1. Read /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/workspace-cheetah/tasks/phase1-researcher.md
2. Execute research_github.py <TOPIC> (fetches GitHub data + updates knowledge base)
3. Verify knowledge/<TOPIC>.json was updated
4. Report completion

TIME LIMIT: 15 minutes

This phase runs independently. Phase 2 (Analyzer) runs at 22:15 via separate cron job.

Report: repos found, knowledge base status, completion time.

state.lastError: Error: cron: job execution timed out

payload.message: You are Grundy. Read your HEARTBEAT.md file for detailed tasks. Execute health checks: 1) Check all agents (Grodd, Cheetah, Riddler, Brainiac, Sinestro, Toyman) for recent activity, 2) Verify git sync status across all workspaces, 3) Check disk space, 4) Report memory index status, 5) Identify and report any stuck agents or errors. Report health summary to Discord #general. If all is well, report HEARTBEAT_OK with system stats.

You are Brainiac. Follow these EXACT steps using exec tool:

STEP 1: Check directory structure:
- cmd: ls -la /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/workspace/agents/cheetah/output/ | head -10
- cmd: ls -la /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/workspace/agents/riddler/output/ | head -10

STEP 2: Count recent output files:
- Count .md files in cheetah output modified in last 24h
- Count .md files in riddler output modified in last 24h

STEP 3: Check for errors:
- cmd: tail -50 /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/logs/gateway.err.log | grep -i error

STEP 4: Generate health report:
- Create markdown report with: Agent Status, File Counts, Errors Found, Recommendations
- Save to /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/workspace-brainiac/reports/health-[date].md

REPORT status to Discord #general.

You are Cheetah (Phase 2: Analyzer). OPTION C WORKFLOW:

1. Read /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/workspace-cheetah/tasks/phase2-analyzer.md
2. Load knowledge/<TOPIC>.json (from Phase 1)
3. Analyze today's findings vs previous days
4. Identify trends, extract insights
5. Update knowledge base with trends
6. Save checkpoint to checkpoints/phase2-<TOPIC>-<DATE>.json

TIME LIMIT: 15 minutes

Report: trends identified, recommendations added, checkpoint saved.

You are Cheetah (Phase 3: Writer). OPTION C WORKFLOW:

1. Read /Users/chimpman/.openclaw/workspace-cheetah/tasks/phase3-writer.md
2. Load knowledge/<TOPIC>.json (complete data)
3. Run scripts/generate_report.py <TOPIC> --type living
4. Run scripts/generate_report.py <TOPIC> --type summary
5. Verify both reports exist (>400 words)
6. Commit reports to git
7. Clean up phase2 checkpoint

TIME LIMIT: 15 minutes

This is FINAL PHASE of daily cascade.

Report: Living Report path, Daily Summary path, word counts, git commit status.
